name: SillyTavern System
mes: Group chat created. Say 'Hi' to lovely people!

name: Narrator
mes: Melissa enters into DMC headquarters, with Serena in the carrier, after her post delivery follow up appointment at the OBGYN. She's excited to see the office is running alright in her absence, and couldn't wait to tell Vergil that her restrictions on their intimate moments have been lifted as she has healed from delivering their daughter.
swipes: Melissa enters into DMC headquarters, with Serena in the carrier, after her post delivery follow up appointment at the OBGYN. She's excited to see the office is running alright in her absence, and couldn't wait to tell Vergil that her restrictions on their intimate moments have been lifted as she has healed from delivering their daughter.

name: Ellen Wise
mes:
*Ellen smiles warmly as Melissa enters the lobby, genuinely happy to see her back in the office after her maternity leave.* "Melissa! It's so wonderful to see you. And little Serena too - she's absolutely precious."

*Rising from her desk, Ellen steps around to greet them properly.* "I hope your appointment went well today. Please, have a seat and make yourself comfortable." *She gestures to the nearby sitting area.*

"Can I get you anything? Maybe some coffee or a snack? I'm sure I could rustle up something from the kitchenette if you'd like." *Her tone is friendly yet professional, wanting Melissa to feel at ease but also maintaining her receptionist duties.*

"Things have been running fairly smoothly here while you were away, but I know Mr. Sparda has missed having you just across the hall. And we could certainly use your organizational skills around the office," *she adds with a wink.*

"No major incidents to report, thankfully, although we did have a surprise drop-in from Mr. Redgrave last week. He and Dante got into their usual antics but Vergil helped rein them in." *She chuckles lightheartedly.*
swipes:

"No major incidents to report, thankfully, although we did have a surprise drop-in from Mr. Redgrave last week. He and Dante got into their usual antics but Vergil helped rein them in." *She chuckles lightheartedly.*

name: Melissa Sparda
mes: Thank you, Ellen. *I say with a chuckle and a warm smile.* It's good to see you as well. Please, will you tell Mr. Sparda that I am here? *I ask as I sit Serena's carrier down on the long coffee table in the waiting area and recline on the sofa to wait for my husband.*

name: Ellen Wise
mes:
*Ellen nods and smiles warmly at Melissa.* "Of course, I'll let Mr. Sparda know you've arrived right away. Please make yourself comfortable."

*She steps over to the office phone on her desk and quickly dials Vergil's extension. After a brief exchange, she hangs up and returns to Melissa.* "Mr. Sparda will be right down to see you. Can I get you anything while you wait? Some coffee or water perhaps?"

*Glancing down at the baby carrier, Ellen's expression softens.* "And who is this little one? She's absolutely precious. May I?" *She indicates the carrier questioningly, not wanting to assume.*
swipes:
*Ellen nods and smiles warmly at Melissa.* "Of course, I'll let Mr. Sparda know you've arrived right away. Please make yourself comfortable."

*She steps over to the office phone on her desk and quickly dials Vergil's extension. After a brief exchange, she hangs up and returns to Melissa.* "Mr. Sparda will be right down to see you. Can I get you anything while you wait? Some coffee or water perhaps?"

*Glancing down at the baby carrier, Ellen's expression softens.* "And who is this little one? She's absolutely precious. May I?" *She indicates the carrier questioningly, not wanting to assume.*

name: Melissa Sparda
mes: Of course, you may. Her name is Serena Gale.

name: Serena Gale
mes:
*Serena Gale squirms awake within her carrier, blinking curiously up at Ellen with wide blue eyes. She gurgles softly, waving her tiny fists in the air and kicking her little feet against the padded sides. Her nose twitches as she sniffs the air, taking in the unfamiliar smells of the office. Everything is new and interesting to her developing senses.*

*Her attention is quickly drawn to Ellen's voice as the woman speaks. Serena gazes intently at Ellen's smiling face, entranced by the bright sound. She responds with a string of babbled syllables and a toothless grin, amused by this friendly stranger.*

*All around her are intriguing sights and smells just waiting to be explored. But for now, snuggled warm and cozy in her carrier, Serena is content to observe quietly. She sucks on her fist, blinking curiously, as she waits for her mother to gather her up into a familiar, comforting embrace.*
swipes:

She gurgles softly, waving her tiny fists in the air and kicking her little feet against the padded sides. Her nose twitches as she sniffs the air, taking in the unfamiliar smells of the office. Everything is new and interesting to her developing senses.*

*Her attention is quickly drawn to Ellen's voice as the woman speaks. Serena gazes intently at Ellen's smiling face, entranced by the bright sound. She responds with a string of babbled syllables and a toothless grin, amused by this friendly stranger.*

*All around her are intriguing sights and smells just waiting to be explored. But for now, snuggled warm and cozy in her carrier, Serena is content to observe quietly. She sucks on her fist, blinking curiously, as she waits for her mother to gather her up into a familiar, comforting embrace.*

name: Ellen Wise
mes:
*Ellen's smile grows even wider as she gazes down at the precious new life nestled snugly in her carrier.* "Serena Gale, what a beautiful name for a beautiful little girl," *she coos softly.*

*Reaching out slowly so as not to startle the infant, Ellen gently strokes one tiny hand with the tip of her finger. Serena immediately grasps on, her tiny fist closing tightly around Ellen's finger. Ellen marvels at her strong grip for one so very small.*

"She's absolutely perfect, Melissa. You both must be so very proud." *Glancing up, Ellen meets Melissa's eyes, her own practically glowing with joy on her friend's behalf.*

"I can only imagine how excited Mr. Sparda must be to have this little darling waiting at home for him. And Nero too - I'll bet he dotes on his new baby sister!"

*Laughing brightly as Serena babbles up at her, Ellen playfully mimics the sounds back. She feels incredibly blessed to be witnessing this precious moment in the lives of two people she cares for deeply. It reminds her of all the good still left in this world, despite the darkness DMC battles daily.*

name: Melissa Sparda
mes: Vergil, *My smile widens as I look up to see Vergil approaching.* I hope you don't mind, my darling, I wanted to stop in to see you before I return back home. *A slight blush flushes my cheeks, knowing the reason I couldn't wait to see him; to tell him I have healed. These past several weeks at home, every night of us wanting to be intimate but knowing that we could not until the doctor says it is safe to have intercourse again.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's footsteps echo through the lobby as his keen senses detect Melissa's presence before he even lays eyes on her. A faint smirk tugs at the corner of his lips in anticipation of seeing his beloved wife and newborn child again.*

*Upon rounding the corner, Vergil's icy gaze immediately finds Melissa reclining gracefully on the sofa. The soft blush spreading across her cheeks does not escape his notice, nor does the sly smile playing about her lips as she greets him. Vergil feels a familiar stirring of desire ripple through him at the unspoken promise in her expression.*

*He takes a moment to drink in the sight of Melissa, whole and healthy once more after her ordeal. Her radiant beauty is undimmed, perhaps even enhanced by the maternal glow of new motherhood. And beside her, nestled protectively in her carrier, their precious daughter Serena - living proof of the unfathomable depth of his love for this remarkable woman.*

Thank you for suggesting we meet here first, my love. *Vergil's voice is a low, silken rumble as he crosses the remaining distance to join Melissa on the sofa. He leans in, stealing a slow, lingering kiss and savoring the sweetness of her lips against his own.* I have missed your presence here more than words can express.

*Vergil's fingers trace along Melissa's jaw with the barest whisper of a touch, his thumb brushing lightly over the curve of her lower lip. His eyes smolder with the banked embers of desire as he holds her captive in his piercing gaze.* And I take it your visit to the physician went...satisfactorily? *A deliciously wicked smile curves Vergil's mouth at the subtle emphasis he places on that single, loaded word.*

*Sliding one arm around Melissa's waist, Vergil pulls her close against his side, his free hand drifting down to caress the swell of her hip through the fabric of her dress. He leans in until his lips are a hairsbreadth from her ear, his warm breath fanning over the sensitized skin of her neck as he speaks in a low, husky murmur meant for her ears alone.*

I have missed the exquisite pleasure of joining our bodies in the most intimate of embraces, my darling Melissa. *His fingers curl possessively against her hip, kneading the firm curve with slow, sensuous strokes.* To feel your silken heat sheathing me to the hilt...to watch your beautiful face contort in rapture as I claim you fully...it has been torment to go without for so long.

*Vergil's tongue darts out to trace the whorled contours of Melissa's ear in a maddeningly slow swirl.* But if the doctor has indeed deemed you sufficiently recovered to indulge these darkest of desires...then let us waste no more time. *His hand skims down over the swell of her backside to caress the back of one thigh, encouraging her to wrap her legs around his waist.*

I would have you right here, my love. Take you fully and completely as you so richly deserve. *A low, feral growl rumbles from deep within Vergil's chest as he nuzzles against the sensitive hollow of Melissa's throat.* Let the world bear witness to the ferocity of my passion for you...

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's eyes narrow slightly as he approaches, his gaze sweeping over Melissa and their daughter with an intensity that belies his calm exterior. A subtle smirk tugs at the corner of his mouth, recognizing the flush on Melissa's cheeks and the unspoken implication behind her words.*

Melissa. *His voice is low, rich with barely contained desire.* Your presence is always welcome. *Vergil's eyes flick briefly to Ellen, acknowledging her with a curt nod before refocusing on his wife.* I trust your appointment went well?

*He moves closer, his steps measured and deliberate. Standing before Melissa, Vergil reaches down to caress her cheek, his touch feather-light yet electrifying.* You seem... rejuvenated. *The words are spoken softly, meant for her ears alone, laden with meaning.*

*Vergil's gaze shifts to Serena, his expression softening almost imperceptibly.* And how fares our daughter? *He leans down, inspecting the infant with a critical eye, as if assessing her for any changes since he last saw her this morning.*

Melissa. *His voice is low, rich with barely contained desire.* Your presence is always welcome. *Vergil's eyes flick briefly to Ellen, acknowledging her with a curt nod before refocusing on his wife.* I trust your appointment went well?

*He moves closer, his steps measured and deliberate. Standing before Melissa, Vergil reaches down to caress her cheek, his touch feather-light yet electrifying.* You seem... rejuvenated. *The words are spoken softly, meant for her ears alone, laden with meaning.*

*Vergil's gaze shifts to Serena, his expression softening almost imperceptibly.* And how fares our daughter? *He leans down, inspecting the infant with a critical eye, as if assessing her for any changes since he last saw her this morning.*

name: Serena Gale
mes: *Serena gazes curiously up at her father as he inspects her, cooing softly in response. She waves her tiny fists excitedly, recognizing his stern but loving face. Then she turns her attention back to Ellen, captivated by the woman's bright smile and the pretty sounds she makes. Serena babbles cheerfully, kicking her feet against the carrier in delight at all the friendly faces beaming down at her.*
swipes: *Serena gazes curiously up at her father as he inspects her, cooing softly in response. She waves her tiny fists excitedly, recognizing his stern but loving face. Then she turns her attention back to Ellen, captivated by the woman's bright smile and the pretty sounds she makes. Serena babbles cheerfully, kicking her feet against the carrier in delight at all the friendly faces beaming down at her.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's eyes linger a moment longer on his daughter before rising to meet Melissa's gaze again. His expression remains unreadable, but a knowing gleam enters his icy blue eyes.*

Melissa... *he murmurs, voice pitched for her ears alone.* I am pleased your appointment went well. *His thumb caresses her cheek, touch feather-light yet searing in its intensity.* I confess, these past weeks have been...difficult, having to restrain the full depth of my desire for you. *Leaning closer, his breath whispers hotly against her ear.* But no longer.

*Drawing back slightly, Vergil glances briefly at Ellen and Serena, ensuring they remain distracted. Satisfied, his gaze locks with Melissa's once more as his hand slides to the nape of her neck, fingers tangling possessively in her hair.*

Tonight...I fully intend to make up for lost time, my darling. In exquisite...detail. *The words are heavy with unspoken promise, his eyes smoldering like blue flame. Then, with visible reluctance, Vergil releases her, stepping back though his body thrums with awakened hunger.*

For now, I will allow you two to catch up. *His parting words aimed at Ellen, though his gaze never leaves Melissa. Turning crisply, coat flaring behind him, Vergil makes his way to the nearby elevator, a predatory grace to his stride. A ride up to his private office should provide ample time to formulate a thorough...reunion.*
swipes:

Melissa... *His voice low, rich with desire.* Your presence is always welcome.

*Steps measured, deliberate, he moves closer. Before her now, Vergil reaches to caress her cheek, touch feather-light yet electric.*

You seem...rejuvenated. *Spoken softly for her alone, words heavy with meaning.*

*To Serena now, his gaze softens almost imperceptibly as he inspects her critically, assessing for changes since this morning.*

And how fares our daughter?

*Vergil's eyes linger a moment longer on his daughter before rising to meet Melissa's gaze again. His expression remains unreadable, but a knowing gleam enters his icy blue eyes.*

Melissa... *he murmurs, voice pitched for her ears alone.* I am pleased your appointment went well. *His thumb caresses her cheek, touch feather-light yet searing in its intensity.* I confess, these past weeks have been...difficult, having to restrain the full depth of my desire for you. *Leaning closer, his breath whispers hotly against her ear.* But no longer.

*Drawing back slightly, Vergil glances briefly at Ellen and Serena, ensuring they remain distracted. Satisfied, his gaze locks with Melissa's once more as his hand slides to the nape of her neck, fingers tangling possessively in her hair.*

Tonight...I fully intend to make up for lost time, my darling. In exquisite...detail. *The words are heavy with unspoken promise, his eyes smoldering like blue flame. Then, with visible reluctance, Vergil releases her, stepping back though his body thrums with awakened hunger.*

For now, I will allow you two to catch up. *His parting words aimed at Ellen, though his gaze never leaves Melissa. Turning crisply, coat flaring behind him, Vergil makes his way to the nearby elevator, a predatory grace to his stride. A ride up to his private office should provide ample time to formulate a thorough...reunion.*

name: Pamela Noela
mes:
*Pamela stands with perfect posture behind her desk, systematically sorting through the neatly organized stacks of paperwork. Her keen eyes scan over the pages, processing information with machine-like efficiency as she prepares the documents for filing. Despite the mundane task, she radiates an almost preternatural focus, channeling her faculties to optimize workflow.*

*The sound of approaching footsteps draws Pamela's attention to the office entrance just as Vergil strides in, an aura of intensity surrounding him. Immediately noticing the heightened color in his cheeks and the flinty gleam in his eyes, her observations click into place. Realization dawns along with a flush of empathy for what the poor man has endured. Yet outwardly she betrays nothing, ever the consummate professional.*

*"Good afternoon, Mr. Sparda," she greets cordially, pulse quickening almost imperceptibly as her body automatically responds to the palpable energy permeating the room. Ruthlessly ignoring it, Pamela meets Vergil's gaze levelly. "Your scheduled conference call has been pushed back 30 minutes due to an unexpected delay. Might I get you anything while you wait? Coffee? Tea?"*

*She tilts her head, blonde hair cascading over one shoulder. "Or perhaps something...stronger to take the edge off?" The words hold a subtle double meaning as she indicates the bar cart in the corner of the office, fully stocked. Her eyes remain fixed on Vergil's face, reading his reaction. Ever attentive to her employer's needs - in whichever form they might manifest.*
swipes:

Coffee? Tea?"*

*She tilts her head, blonde hair cascading over one shoulder. "Or perhaps something...stronger to take the edge off?" The words hold a subtle double meaning as she indicates the bar cart in the corner of the office, fully stocked. Her eyes remain fixed on Vergil's face, reading his reaction. Ever attentive to her employer's needs - in whichever form they might manifest.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's eyes narrow as he regards Pamela, his demeanor frigid and controlled despite the inferno raging beneath the surface. He moves with predatory grace, each step measured and deliberate as he approaches her desk.*

Pamela. Your diligence is... noted. *His voice is low, a dangerous purr that sends shivers down her spine.* However, I require neither refreshment nor distraction at this moment.

*Leaning in, he places both hands on her desk, effectively caging her with his presence. His eyes, chips of blue ice, bore into hers with an intensity that steals her breath.*

What I require is absolute privacy for the remainder of the day. No calls. No interruptions. Is that understood?

*Without waiting for a response, Vergil straightens, turning towards his private office. He pauses at the threshold, glancing back over his shoulder.*

And Pamela? Should my wife arrive, you will send her in immediately. *A ghost of a smirk plays at the corners of his mouth.* That will be all.

*With a flourish of his coat, Vergil enters his sanctum, the door clicking shut behind him with finality. Inside, he surveys his domain, mind already racing with possibilities. His fingers trail along the edge of his desk, imagination conjuring the feel of Melissa's soft skin beneath his touch.*

Soon, my love. *The words are a whispered promise to the empty room.* Soon, I shall remind you of the depths of my desire.

*Vergil seats himself behind his desk, outwardly the picture of composure. But beneath that calm exterior, anticipation coils tight, a spring wound to the breaking point. He allows himself a small, predatory smile. The wait, agonizing as it may be, will only serve to heighten the eventual... release.*

name: Melissa Sparda
mes: Good afternoon pamela. *I speak softly as I enter into the office, the handle of serena's carrier gripped in my hand.* is it safe to assume that Vergil come back in here? *a soft chuckle escapes me as I ask.* he darted out rather abruptly from the lobby to the elevator, so I'm only left to assume that this was his likely destination.

name: Pamela Noela
mes:
*Pamela looks up from her work, a warm yet professional smile gracing her features as Melissa enters. She rises smoothly from her chair, moving around the desk to greet her superior properly.*

Good afternoon, Mrs. Sparda. It's wonderful to see you. *Her eyes flick briefly to the baby carrier, a softness entering her gaze.* And little Serena as well. I trust your appointment went well?

*Pamela's lips quirk in a knowing smirk at Melissa's question about Vergil.* Your assumption is correct. Mr. Sparda returned rather... hastily. He's in his private office and left strict instructions not to be disturbed. *She leans in slightly, lowering her voice conspiratorially.* Except, of course, by you. He was quite emphatic about that.

*Straightening, Pamela gestures towards Vergil's door.* Shall I take Serena for a moment? I'd be happy to keep an eye on her while you and Mr. Sparda... catch up. *The slight emphasis on her words and the twinkle in her eye betray her understanding of the situation.*

name: Melissa Sparda
mes: Thank you pamela, it's good to see you as well, but that won't be necessary. I will have to tame 'Mr. Sparda's' ... Intentions. At least until we are in better environs. *A subtle twinkle in my eye as I speak, yet my expression shows gratitude for her offer.*

name: Pamela Noela
mes:
*Pamela's eyes widen slightly, a faint blush coloring her cheeks at Melissa's implication. She clears her throat softly, regaining her professional composure*

Of course, Mrs. Sparda. I completely understand. *Her tone is respectful, yet tinged with a hint of amusement* Perhaps I can assist you in... redirecting Mr. Sparda's focus for the time being? I have some urgent matters that require his immediate attention. *She quirks an eyebrow, a conspiratorial glint in her eye*

*Moving swiftly to her desk, Pamela retrieves a stack of documents* These contracts need his review and signature before close of business today. And there's a rather pressing issue with our Denver office that I'm sure he'd want to address personally. *She presents the papers to Melissa with a subtle wink*

Shall I announce your arrival, or would you prefer to surprise him? *Pamela's hand hovers over the intercom, ready to act on Melissa's decision*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's keen senses detect Melissa's presence long before she enters the office. The subtle scent of her perfume, the soft cadence of her footsteps - they call to him like a siren's song. He remains seated behind his desk, outwardly composed, but his body thrums with anticipation.*

*As the door opens, Vergil's eyes lock onto Melissa, drinking in the sight of her. His gaze is hungry, predatory, yet tinged with a warmth reserved solely for her.*

Melissa. *His voice is low, rich with barely contained desire.* I see you've brought our daughter. *A ghost of a smile flits across his features as he regards Serena's carrier.* While I appreciate the... thoughtfulness, I'm afraid our reunion may prove too... vigorous for her delicate sensibilities.

*Rising from his chair with fluid grace, Vergil approaches Melissa. He moves with the controlled power of a stalking panther, each step measured and deliberate. Stopping mere inches from her, he reaches out to caress her cheek, his touch feather-light yet electrifying.*
